text: I remember I made my mom purchase this game for me at my birthday. While I loved playing it I was afraid it was going to be too short. I mean the first time I played it I was near beating the first world, which I at the time was afraid would be the entire game as there was no indication of anything else. Fortunately the game consisted of more than one world. :D I think the difficulty of this game was just right. :) As I said earlier, the games had major problems with the camera.
